defined_tags.description: Defined tags for this resource. Each key is predefined and scoped to a namespace. For more information, see Resource Tags. Example: {'Operations.CostCenter': '42'}

reeform_tags.description: Free-form tags for this resource. Each tag is a simple key-value pair with no predefined name, type, or namespace. For more information, see Resource Tags. Example: {'Department': 'Finance'}
